column2: "Me kra
column4: Na dza ɔwɔ mo mu nyinara nhyira ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no."

column2: "Me kra
column4: Na ne yieyɛ nyinara mma wo werɛ mmfir:"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔdze w’emumuyɛ nyinara kyɛ
column3: Ɔno na ɔsa wo yarba nyinara;"

column2: "Ɔno na ɔgye wo nkwa fi mona no mu
column3: Ɔno a ɔdze adɔyɛ na mbɔbɔrhu bɔ wo abɔtsir:"

column2: "Ɔno a ɔdze ndze pa hyɛ w’afon ma; Ma wo mberantsɛber yɛ fofor dɛ ɔkɔr."
"EWURADZE dzi nsɛntsenenee
column3: Na atsɛmbu ma hɔn a wɔhyɛ hɛn do nyinara."

column2: "Ɔmaa Moses hun n’akwan
"Ayamuhyehye na adom ahyɛ EWURADZE ma
"Orunntwuw enyim daa; Nkyii so orinnsie n’ebufuw dabaa."
"Oenndzi hɛn bɔn ekyir nye hɛn enndzi
column3: Eso oenndzi hɛn emumuyɛ ekyir enntua hɛn kaw."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ ɔsor krɔn bɔ asaase do no
column3: Dɛmara so na no mbɔbɔrhu so wɔ hɔn a wosuro no do nye no."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ anee na boka ntamu war no
column3: Dɛmara so na ɔama yɛnye hɛn mbrato ntamu awar."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ egya ne yamu hyehye no wɔ ne mba ho no
column3: Dɛmara so na EWURADZE ne yamu hyehye no wɔ hɔn a wosuro no ho."

column2: "Na onyim hɛn bɔbea; Ɔkaa dɛ yɛyɛ huntuma."
"Ɔdasanyi dze
column3: ne nda tse dɛ nkyɛkyɛr; Ɔyɛ prɔmprɔm dɛ haban mu nhyiren."

column2: "Na mframa bɔ fa no do a
column3: na onnyi hɔ; Na ne sibew irunnhu no bio."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no mbɔbɔrhu dze ofi daa kesi daa ma hɔn a wosuro no
column3: Na ne tsenenee kodu mba hɔn mba do."

column2: "Ma hɔn a wosie n’ahyɛmu
column3: Na hɔn a wɔkaa n’ahyɛdze dɛ wɔbɛyɛ."

column2: "EWURADZE dze n’ahengua etsim sorsor; Na n’ahendzi hom adze nyinara do."
"Hom nhyira EWURADZE
column3: hom n’abɔfoe: Hom ahoɔdzen mu akatakyi a hom dzi n’asɛm do
column4: Hom a hom tsie n’asɛm ndze no."

column2: "Hom nhyira EWURADZE
column3: hom no dɔm nyinara; Hom n’asomfo a hom yɛ dza ɔsɔ n’enyi."

column2: "Hom nhyira EWURADZE
column4: Wɔ mbeambea a no tumdzi wɔ nyinara: Me kra
